response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product is worth more than just its monetary value; it holds the potential to revolutionize the way you operate or experience certain aspects of life. Given its significance, I propose to offer you this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000.

This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a fair return on my investment. I understand that the true worth of the product may be subjective and varies based on individual needs and circumstances. However, I am confident that the value I am proposing exceeds any other potential offers you might receive.

Please consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information about the product, I am more than happy to discuss it with you. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of working together to bring this exceptional product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
